caption:
This photograph captures an outdoor scene where two children are engaged in fishing from a bridge. The foreground displays a boy, focused intently on the task, lowering a small, basket-like fishing trap into the water using a rope. He is dressed in a casual white t-shirt and dark pants. Next to him, partially visible, is another child in a yellow top, who appears to be observing or waiting their turn.

The bridge itself is concrete, featuring a simple, functional design with a solid guardrail that the children lean against. The body of water below is calm and reflects a partly cloudy sky. The landscape in the background is scenic, showcasing low hills and sparse vegetation along with some developed areas, possibly a small town. The overall mood is peaceful, hinting at a leisurely day spent by the water in a quiet, natural setting.
title: Hawaiian boy crabbing from bridge
